div: Formation and decay of the transient absorption signals for TAA-ph 1-Ir-ph 1-AQ (green) and TAA-ph 2-Ir-ph 2-AQ (violet) in dry and deoxygenated CH 3CN at 293 K monitoring the TAAË™ + band at 720 nm (green) and 700 nm (violet). Excitation of both triads occurred at 433 nm with laser pulses of ca. 10 ns duration.
